description:
Add a few extra layers of comfort to your outdoor, or indoor bike. This gel cover softens the ride without the need to buy a whole new saddle.

  • Elevated wings create an anatomical ridge for protection and perineal comfort
  • 3-layers construction: light wicking fabric, soft Royalgel, and a supportive foam layer
  • Slides over existing saddle and secures with a cord-lock
  • Dimensions – medium: 28.8 x 19.7cm and large: 24.8 x 22.1
name: Selle Royal Royalgel Seat Cover - Unisex
